changes: Fixed the randomization of item quantities for isCabinet loot.
Fixed a bug that could cause the second player entering a property during a robbery not to load correctly.
Added Config.StopRobbery with option to enable/disable and price configuration - then there will be a button with which you can stop robbery
Added noise bar drop if you keep quiet at house
Added additional debugging
Added protection against misconfiguration of items (If you have Config.Debug, you will receive information regarding errors made)
Fixed the display of the remaining time until the possibility of robbing a house again
Added official support for older ESX using ESX.GetExtendedPlayers function
Added new language translation: German, French, Spanish
Fixed server-side bug attempt to get length of a nil value (field 'tenants')
Fixed a bug that caused using a target on a pawnshop ped to launch the fence menu
Fixed the display of a hud after starting a robbery in the planning menu
Fixed a last bug regarding 'Notification' when copying data in the configuration menu
Added new language translation: Czech
Added requiredPolices value to each house separately in config.houseslist.lua - you can set the minimum number of police officers online for a player to start a house robbery
Added Config.PoliceJobs, here you can define the names of the jobs to be considered for requiredPolices
Fixed a bug regarding 'Hud' when opening the configuration menu
Fixed a bug regarding removing robbery organisator ped after relog
Fixed removal of noise bar after house receives timeout
Fixed the use of SV.checkBeforeStartRobbery function
Patch for not loading FreezeEntityPosition for the interior
Patch for not loading heading for the objects
